name: TC-2-P :: Create a new value for an Attribute

actions.expectedResult: The "Attributes & Features" page is displayed correctly.

actions.action: Click "Add new value" in the top-right corner.
actions.expectedResult: A new page appears containing a form to create a new value.

actions.action: Select "Weight" from the "Attribute group" drop-down list.
actions.expectedResult: The dropdown list shows "Weight" as the selected attribute group.

actions.action: Enter a specific value e.g. "500g" in the "Value" field.
actions.expectedResult: The value "500g" is entered in the field.
A "Successful creation" message is displayed at the top of the page.
